root.name: Arkanoid: Doh It Again
root.description: Gameplay and MechanicsYou play with a ship as your paddle. Rounds are completed when all the colour and silver blocks on the screen have been eliminated. Enemys enter from the doors at the top of the play area. Every ten rounds a boss enemy will have to be fought. Some of the blocks contain power-ups that you must catch with your paddle to use. BlocksColours: one hit.Silver: takes three hits.Gold: can not be destroyed. Power-upsSkip RoundExtra lifeMulti ball creates eight extra balls.Double length paddleCatch and release ballShoot out blocks with lasers from your paddleBall destroys all blocks in path Force field allowing for one missed ball Paddle back to normal Some of the power-ups can be used together.
